resources.string: Established in 2000, the CMR Institute of Technology imparts quality, pragmatic education in engineering and management to help students hone their analytical abilities and develop their creative thinking skills. CMRIT meets the rapidly growing need for technology professionals by nurturing young minds in an innovative and progressive learning environment. Situated in the very heart of South Indiaâ€™s IT corridor, the CMRIT campus in Whitefield, Bangalore is centrally located, well connected and easily accessible.
